snippet: Lew Ford, a veteran outfielder, has become a symbol for the Orioles, who have relied on contributions from every corner during their unexpected run.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles veteran outfielder Lew Ford has become a symbol for the Orioles, who have relied on contributions from every corner during their unexpected run.
lead_paragraph: Lew Ford, a veteran outfielder, has become a symbol for the Orioles, who have relied on contributions from every corner during their unexpected run.

headline.seo: Lew Ford Is a Symbol for the Surprising Orioles
headline.main: Outfielder, Like Team, Detoured To Success
